feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.4.0
entry.content:
üö® Breaking Changes

  • Moves search to backend for better experience. It does remove show search results in context.  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3245 (9f2f8)

   üöÄ Features

  • Makes improvements to mobile view  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3244 (74063)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Supports searching for int, float and boolean  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3247 (a1efb)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.4.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes merged view and incorrect base. fixes #3248  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3249 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3248 (2a3af)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.4.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Shows raw json in complex logs with option to copy  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3251 (9ddbe)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Improves search on initital load  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3253 (45c72)
  • Fixes search while looking back history  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3256 (6791c)
  • Improves search by backfilling on first search  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3261 (a5ffd)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3241 (0d58f)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3260 (328a2)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.4.3
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Cleans up on hover background color  -  by @amir20 (d6477)
  • Cleans up login page  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3263 (8183b)
  • deps: Update dependency unplugin-vue-router to ^0.10.8  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3262 (14187)

   üèé Performance

  • Improves animation css to use translate instead  -  by @amir20 (e841b)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.4.4
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes a css bug that was causing browser horizontal scrollbar. see #3278  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3279 and https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3278 (66d80)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3264 (12465)
  • Update dependency vue-i18n to v10  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3269 (a5334)
  • Update dependency @intlify/unplugin-vue-i18n to v5  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3268 (5cc0b)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3270 (a482b)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3271 (b7771)
  • Update dependency date-fns to v4  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3277 (2db41)
    View changes on GitHub
